definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: I don't approve of your defeatist attitude.
sentences.chinese: 我不贊成你這種失敗主義的態度。

sentences.english: Young people should face and defeat adversities; they should not have the mood of defeatism.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人應面對和戰勝逆境，不應該有失敗主義心理。

sentences.english: Yet wariness should not be mistaken for defeatism.
sentences.chinese: 而且謹慎不應該被誤解爲失敗主義。

sentences.english: There is no point going out there with a defeatist attitude.
sentences.chinese: 懷着一種失敗主義的態度上陣根本沒有任何意義。

sentences.english: Not bothering to vote is a sure sign of defeatism .
sentences.chinese: 連投票都不投，純粹是失敗主義。
